awards.text: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 6 wins & 9 nominations.

fullplot: Semi-follow up of the first "If These Walls Could Talk" with three segments set in the same house, but with different occupants which spans nearly 40 years. While the first film delt with women and the topic of abortion, this deals with women and the topic of lesbianism.
plot: Trio of stories about lesbian couples in three different decades.
title: If These Walls Could Talk 2
